abstract.p: Mxyplyzyk has sale on home furnishings; photo (S)

block.p: Mxyplyzyk, the design store that proved that it is not important to have a name that everyone can spell, will hold a storewide sale later this month. Sale items include Chilewich vinyl placemats, $10 (they were $12.50), walnut-veneer vases, above, $24 to $48 (were $30 to $60), a clear acrylic stool with built-in magazine rack designed by Karim Rashid, $212 (was $265), and wooden LED clocks, $148 (were $185). Bath items, desk accessories and children's toys will also be discounted. The sale will run from Feb. 15 through Feb. 28 at 125 Greenwich Avenue (13th Street), (800) 243-9810, or mxyplyzyk.com.

Bath items, desk accessories and children's toys will also be discounted. The sale will run from Feb. 15 through Feb. 28 at 125 Greenwich Avenue (13th Street), (800) 243-9810, or mxyplyzyk.com.
